front.title: A Generic Referral Object for Internet Entities

abstract.t: The purpose of a referral is to enable a given entity in a multipartyapplication to pass information to another party. This memospecifies a Generic Referral Object (GRO) to be used in the contextof referrals. The proposed object is compact and is application-independent. Both IPv4 and IPv6 schemes are supported, as well asupper layer identifiers. Additional information to characterise anenclosed reference is also described. To allow proper interpretationof referrals, a new notion of scope identifiers is introduced.
